text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @MarkMeadows @PressSec 

Donald Trump is knocking down the 1st Amendment by calling anyone protests against him "mobs" -- he would rather protect racist statues than protect Americans from COVID-19 or our soldiers from Putin and the Taliban ...
